inclusion.criterion: Apparently healthy adult of 18 to 45 years of age.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Apparently healthy based on a medical history taken prior to vaccination.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women with child bearing potential must be non pregnant which will be confirmed by negative urine pregnancy test during screening and prior to vaccination on day 0 as well.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior history of Meningitis infection or vaccination with any Meningococcal vaccine.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of investigational drugs or other investigational vaccines within 3 months prior to first injection with the study vaccine.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of viral encephalitis/meningitis, but it is not clear if they have received any Meningococcal vaccine. They also have a recent history of febrile illness.
